explains: n. 改变，变更；（对衣物的）改动
wordGroup: hydrothermal alteration 热液蚀变；水热蚀变

sentences.en: Prices may be subject to alteration.
sentences.cn: 价格可能会受变更影响。

sentences.en: Her jacket was at the boutique waiting for alteration.
sentences.cn: 她的夹克在服装精品店里等待修改。

sentences.en: The dress will not need much alteration.
